title: Google Contacts redesign adds bottom bar to better surface tools, rolling out now
content:
The majority of Google’s apps today feature a bottom bar and Contacts for Android is now the latest to add it as part of a redesign that retains a modified navigation drawer.

more…

The post Google Contacts redesign adds bottom bar to better surface tools, rolling out now appeared first on 9to5Google.
